mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into support_trade_types (trade_type, base_profit, terminal_rate, base_rate, floor_profit, top_profit, sort_index, pay_channel_id, service_rate, service_profit, trade_type_id, top_charge, floor_charge, description) values (#{tradeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{baseProfit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{terminalRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{baseRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floorProfit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{topProfit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serviceRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serviceProfit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tradeTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{topCharge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floorCharge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update support_trade_types set trade_type = #{tradeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, base_profit = #{baseProfit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, terminal_rate = #{terminalRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, base_rate = #{baseRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, floor_profit = #{floorProfit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, top_profit = #{topProfit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort_index = #{sortIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_channel_id = #{payChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, service_rate = #{serviceRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, service_profit = #{serviceProfit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trade_type_id = #{tradeTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, top_charge = #{topCharge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, floor_charge = #{floorCharge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, trade_type, base_profit, terminal_rate, base_rate, floor_profit, top_profit, sort_index, pay_channel_id, service_rate, service_profit, trade_type_id, top_charge, floor_charge, description from support_trade_types where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, trade_type, base_profit, terminal_rate, base_rate, floor_profit, top_profit, sort_index, pay_channel_id, service_rate, service_profit, trade_type_id, top_charge, floor_charge, description from support_trade_types
select stt.*, dtt.trade_value dtt_trade_value from support_trade_types stt inner join dictionary_trade_types dtt on stt.trade_type_id=dtt.id where pay_channel_id=#{param1} order by sort_index
